attributes.title: 2019 Renault Megane IV 1.2T Dynamique

attributes.description:
The i20 is a modern, more refined car than ever before. As such, it is more about utility than entertainment. It’s a genuine all-rounder, content to be driven as a weekday commuter but still with enough cargo space and engine capacity to handle weekend trips to the beach.

It performs most functions slightly better than average and tops the package off with great fuel use. There are better handling and riding cars in this class but the i20 can hold its own in terms of everyday operation and ease of use. 

The hatch is spacious enough to store the weekly groceries or a couple of small suitcases and interior space is on par for this segment. The engine isn’t too peaky, so it doesn’t have to be driven like abuzz-box and visibility is good all round.

Feel free to contact us today!

attributes.description:
KIA GRAND SEDONA  2.2 CRDi EX A/T (7SEAT)
Stunning Grand Sedona in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Automatic transmission and gives a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. height adjustable seat, dual sliding doors. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, Roodepoort situated in Wilropark and book this beauty for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle.
